# Introduction 


# Linear Regression  

```{r}
#-----perform single variable linear regression-----  
orange <- as_tibble(Orange)  

lm_fit <- lm(age ~ circumference, data = orange)
summary(lm_fit)  
```

```{r}
#-----tidy results of linear regression-----  
tidy(lm_fit)

glance(lm_fit)
```
